name: Castle Raider | Gamers creativity under lockdown |
name_original: Castle Raider | Gamers creativity under lockdown |
description:
A knight is sent out to explore the depth of an unknown dungeon. A chest full of jewels is protected by a giant bug assisted by small but powerful frogs. Venture with the knight through this mildly lit dungeon, kill the enemies, unlock the chest of jewels and avoid the death traps.

Controls:

Move - WAD keys/Arrow keys

Crouch - 'S' key/Down arrow key 

Jump - Space

Attack - L Shift

Block - 'Z' key 

Crouch block - 'S'/Down arrow key + 'Z'

Interact - 'X' key 

NOTE: If you die at any point, press space or shift to start over from the start of the level and lose 1 life. Press the 'R' key at any point to restart the game entirely.

(This game is still in development, but enjoy what it is so far!)
